Text: thanks !  almost got this for the kindle until I realized I couldn't even print one page for reference.  This is much better !  thanks for all of your sharing.

Mr. MANTESHWER hands down heads down all salutes go to you ! 
Your books are a treasure to possess!

Thank you very much for your time!

You are the Man among Men!

i've been downloading your e-books for far too long now, and decided to sign up just so i could post you a comment.  thanks a lot mate, you don't know how much money you've saved everyone! books still aren't cheap these days, isn't it crazy?

my appreciations once again!
